item.title: 美国裁员计划有所缓解，但仍为 2022 年以来最高的 11 月份
item.description: 根据职业介绍公司 Challenger, Gray & Christmas 的数据，上个月美国公司宣布的裁员人数在 10 月份激增后有所下降，但仍是三年来最高的 11 月份。【原文：Announced layoffs at US companies fell last month after surging in October, but were still the highest for any November in three years, according to data from outplacement firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas.】

item.title: 巴西经济增长下滑，为降息埋下伏笔
item.description: 巴西经济在第三季度失去了增长势头，这增强了人们对巴西央行将降低借贷成本的预期，因为经济活动降温有助于抑制顽固的通货膨胀。【原文：Brazil’s economy lost momentum in the third quarter, reinforcing expectations that the central bank will lower borrowing costs as cooling economic activity helps to rein in stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 欧洲从美国液化天然气激增中找到过冬慰藉
item.description: 贸易商们表示，尽管最初遇到了一些障碍，但本季度非洲大陆的燃料供应不会有问题。【原文：Traders say the continent’s fuel supplies will be fine this season, despite initial hurdles.】

item.title: 英国投资者在里夫斯预算案公布前从基金中撤资 30 亿英镑
item.description: 11 月份，英国投资者从股票市场撤资 30 亿英镑，在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）发布预算案之前，几乎每天都有资金流出。【原文：UK-based investors pulled out £3 billion from equities in November, with outflows nearly every day ahead of Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’s budget, before starting to buy stocks again when the measures weren’t as bad as feared.】

item.title: YouTube 创作者制作人工智能视频，让宝宝紧盯屏幕
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，亚历山德拉-莱文（Alexandra S. Levine）将继续报道 YouTube 上针对两岁以下儿童的人工智能视频日益增多的情况。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Alexandra S. Levine follows her report on the growing use of AI videos on YouTube aimed at children younger than 2 years old.】

item.title: 柏林对峙威胁病态经济的进一步动荡
item.description: 德国联合政府上台仅七个月，就面临着一场可能导致其下台的关键投票。【原文：Just seven months into office, Germany’s coalition government faces a key vote that could trigger its demise.】

item.title: 关于在 2026 年全面修订《美国采矿与运输协定》的辩论在华盛顿拉开帷幕
item.description: 特朗普在第一任期内谈判达成的协议将于 2026 年接受审查，一场有争议的辩论正在进行中【原文：The deal Trump negotiated in his first term comes up for review in 2026 and a contentious debate is under way】

item.title: 激进分子 Barington 瞄准比尔控股公司，推动出售计划
item.description: 激进投资者 Barington Capital Group 已加入 Elliott Investment Management 和 Starboard Value LP 的行列，入股商业支付公司 Bill Holdings Inc.【原文：Activist investor Barington Capital Group has taken a stake in business payments firm Bill Holdings Inc., joining Elliott Investment Management and Starboard Value LP, and is urging the company’s board to explore a sale.】

item.title: Pimco 拒绝 "卖美 "言论，押注美国债券大获全胜
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：The bad news just seemed to keep piling up for Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 中国高管被列为印尼辐射案嫌疑人
item.description: 印度尼西亚警方已将一家金属冶炼公司的一名中国董事列为铯-137 污染案的嫌疑人，该案最终导致放射性虾和运动鞋远销美国。【原文：Indonesian police have named a Chinese director of a metal smelting company as a suspect in a cesium-137 contamination case that ultimately led to radioactive shrimp and sneakers being exported as far as the US.】

item.title: 谷歌就广告技术反垄断合规性提出的建议接受欧盟检验
item.description: 谷歌被指控违反了与其广告技术业务相关的反垄断法，并因此被处以近 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元）的罚款，欧盟委员会正在就谷歌提出的整改方案征求业界的反馈意见。【原文：The European Commission is seeking industry feedback on Google’s offer to fix alleged antitrust violations linked to its ad tech business that sparked a fine of nearly €3 billion ($3.5 billion).】

item.title: 怀疑论者称，不要相信对稳定币和国库券的炒作
item.description:
数字硬币可能只是改变了购买国库券的对象，而不是创造了新的需求。【原文：

Digital coins may just shift who buys T-bills, rather than create new demand.

】

item.title: 印度食糖出口商寻求更强劲的世界糖价刺激销售
item.description: 印度作为第二大产糖国，其糖厂一直在努力争取在新榨季大量出口，贸易商和分析师称，只有全球糖价大幅上涨，出口速度才会加快。【原文：Sugar mills in India, the second-largest producer, have been struggling to export big volumes in the new season, with traders and analysts saying that the pace will only pick up if global prices rise sharply.】

item.title: 英国能源技术公司 Kraken 寻求 5 亿美元融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，帮助公用事业公司管理向清洁能源过渡的软件平台 Kraken Technologies Ltd. 已启动新一轮融资，融资额约为 5 亿美元。【原文：Kraken Technologies Ltd., a software platform that helps utilities manage the transition to cleaner energy, has kicked off a fresh funding round to raise about $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 调查发现孟买豪宅价格堪比曼哈顿下城
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，孟买高档公寓的价格目前已与纽约某些地区不相上下，这凸显了该国金融之都财富和房地产价格的迅速增长。【原文：The prices of premium apartments in Mumbai are now on a par with some parts of New York, according to a new report, underscoring the rapid rise of wealth and property prices in the country’s financial capital.】

item.title: Alphabet 的人工智能芯片是价值 9000 亿美元的潜在 "秘密武器
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 的投资者越来越相信，该公司的半导体产品可能成为谷歌母公司未来收入的重要驱动力。【原文：Alphabet Inc. investors are growing increasingly confident that the company’s semiconductors could represent a significant driver of future revenue for Google’s parent.】

item.title: 做空机构瞄准消费者评论公司，Trustpilot 大跌
item.description: Trustpilot Group Plc 的股价在伦敦暴跌，此前 Grizzly Research 称其持有空头头寸，并发布了一份关于这家消费者评论公司的负面报告。【原文：Shares in Trustpilot Group Plc plunged in London after Grizzly Research said it holds a short position and published a negative report on the consumer-review company.】

item.title: 南非发行新的美元债券，加入债券热潮
item.description: 南非一年来首次开始发行基准美元债务，与其他非洲发行商一道利用较低的借贷成本。【原文：South Africa began an offering of benchmark dollar debt for the first time in a year, joining other African issuers taking advantage of lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 机场装卸公司曼西斯在扩张中权衡首次公开募股和收购事宜
item.description: 机场地面服务供应商孟席斯航空公司（Menzies Aviation）执行主席表示，该公司正考虑在 "几年内 "进行首次公开募股，同时将在美国和亚洲寻找发展机会。【原文：Airport ground-services provider Menzies Aviation is considering an initial public offering in “a few years,” and in the meantime will look for growth opportunities in the US and Asia, its executive chairman said.】

item.title: 英国资产丰富、现金匮乏的退休人员重振小众债务产品
item.description: 随着英国退休人员寻求释放他们在房价指数增长时期积累的房屋价值，一种罕见的资产担保证券正在卷土重来。【原文：A rare type of asset-backed security is making a comeback as Britain’s retirees seek to unlock some of the value they’ve built up in their homes during a period of exponential house-price growth.】

item.title: UPM和Sappi将组建价值17亿美元的绘图纸合资企业
item.description: UPM-Kymmene Oyj和Sappi Ltd.计划将其绘图纸资产合并为一家合资企业，企业价值为14.2亿欧元（17亿美元）。【原文：UPM-Kymmene Oyj and Sappi Ltd. plan to combine their graphic paper assets into a joint venture with an enterprise value of €1.42 billion ($1.7 billion).】

item.title: 2026 年加拿大股市经济表现将优于美国股市
item.description: 由于投资者对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的狂言和关税造成的动荡进行了定价，加拿大的股票基准在第一季度陷入了困境。自此之后，该指数一路高歌猛进，策略师预计这种飙升势头将持续到 2026 年。【原文：Canada’s equity benchmark spent the first quarter stuck in a rut as investors priced the tumult caused by US President Donald Trump’s bombast and tariffs. It’s been on a tear ever since, and strategists expect the surge to persist in 2026.】

item.title: 私人信贷和股票市场面临英国央行压力测试
item.description: 在监管机构对私人信贷和股权投资行业的增长日益关注之际，英格兰银行启动了一项演习，以模拟私人信贷和股权投资行业如何应对金融压力。【原文：The Bank of England launched an exercise to war-game how the private credit and equity industry would respond to financial stress, amid growing regulatory concern over the growth of the sector.】

item.title: 博雅银行罕见赞助埃塞俄比亚公路赛
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）计划赞助埃塞俄比亚大长跑，这是一家国际贷款机构在非洲仅次于尼日利亚的人口最多的国家进行的一次罕见的冒险。【原文：Bank of America Corp. plans to sponsor the Great Ethiopian Run, a rare venture by an international lender into Africa’s most populous nation after Nigeria.】

item.title: 50 岁后离婚？有专门的财务顾问为您服务
item.description:
有一类特殊的财务顾问正在帮助结婚多年的夫妇处理分居过程中经常出现的复杂问题。【原文：

A special class of financial advisers is helping long-married couples handle the often tangled complications of splitting up. 

】

item.title: 沙特人入股阿斯顿-马丁 F1 深化了海湾地区对体育运动的影响
item.description: 迈凯轮车队的队友兰多-诺里斯（Lando Norris）和奥斯卡-皮亚斯特里（Oscar Piastri —）以及红牛车队的马克斯-维斯塔潘（Max Verstappen —）将在本周末的阿布扎比站为车手冠军展开三方争夺。【原文：After a thriller in Qatar, Formula One’s 2025 season has come down to the final race of the season this weekend in Abu Dhabi, where McLaren teammates Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri — along with Red Bull’s Max Verstappen — will face a three-way battle for the drivers’ title.】

item.title: 瑞士放宽武器出口规定以扶持国内国防企业
item.description: 瑞士将放宽对武器出口的严格规定，这对因俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰而失去业务的瑞士国防工业来说是个好消息。【原文：Switzerland is set to relax strict rules on weapons exports, a relief for its defense industry which has lost business in the wake of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 英国央行调查显示：英国企业预计工资将增长 3.8%
item.description: 英国央行的一项调查显示，英国公司预计明年将把工资提高 3.8%，这很可能会加剧一些利率制定者对通胀胶着的担忧。【原文：UK companies expect to increase wages by 3.8% over the next year, according to a Bank of England survey that’s likely to fuel concerns among some rate-setters about sticky inflation.】

item.title: 中国乐观情绪推动新兴市场股市升至两周高点
item.description: 周四，外国投资者对中国股市的乐观情绪提振了新兴市场股票基准指数，推动其创下自11月17日以来的最高收盘价，并有望连续第二周上涨。由于投资者在等待美联储下周的政策决定，货币汇率持稳。【原文：Foreign-investor optimism about Chinese stocks lifted the emerging-market equity benchmark on Thursday, pushing it toward its highest close since Nov. 17 and putting it on track for a second straight weekly gain. Currencies were steady as investors awaited next week’s Federal Reserve policy decision.】

item.title: 欧盟对马斯克 X 公司的调查测试了特朗普时代集团的数字影响力
item.description: 在欧盟寻求在年底前完成未竟事业之际，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）又一次站到了舞台中央。【原文：As the European Union seeks to wrap up unfinished business before the end of the year, Elon Musk is once again taking center stage.】
